new york şehrinde tatildeyim aslen kanadalıyım hayatımın çoğunda sosyal kaygıyla mücadele ettim konfor alanımın dışına çıkıp insanlarla etkileşim kurmaya çalışıyorum rastgele insanlarla etkileşime girileceği küçük sohbetler yapılacağı iyi ilk izlenim yaratılacağı hakkında videolar izliyordum denemeye karar verdim metroda hoş görünümlü adam gördüm yanına gidip merhaba diyeceğime gününün geçtiğini soracağıma muhtemelen kaçacağıma karar verdim lol göz teması kurduk gülümsedim doğru yürümeye başladım zar zor merhaba diyebildim sadece siktiğimin solar pleksusuna yumruk attı zor değildi canım yandı demeden koşarak uzaklaştı dostum yoldan geçen gördü yardım ruhuna sağlık verip iyi olmadığımı sordu sarsıldım otel odama geri döndüm azından nazik kadınla konuşmayı başardım yüzden sonuçta zafer kabul ediyorum başka birinin başına geldi hatırlattı çoğunlukla evde kalıyorum normaldir bağlam açısından iyi harika fiziğe sahip yo erkeğim fark yaratırsa

ive survived narcissistic abuse from two people close family ive received so much bullying and mental abuse in life and never knew why always end up being scapegoat started analasing group behaviors ive dealt with in my life based my own experiences and knowledge about social dynamics gained from various sources online that resonated with me and this is what im always recommending to myself originally wanted to post this as comment to question about how to avoid getting teased and being picked in groups but my response ended up being too long so decided to make post its important to note that im woman so maybe not everything is going to be applicable for guys but tried to keep it universal im open to any suggestions and before you ask me about my sources my main source is my own life and posts from other people social media who went through same things as me and whose inshights found very useful enjoy how to avoid social abuse and becoming groups scapaegoat especially when youve been through trauma have social anxiety and lack confidence or youre neurodivergent avoid people who tease others frequently and guilt trip you when you call it out if youre not comfortable with teasing you wont ever be no matter how light it is objectively and you wont be able to force yourself into laughing it off and genuiniely finding it amusing it will always hurt and every time you sense weirdoffputing vibe from anyone run into the other direction your gut knows what your conscious brain doesnt yet no matter what people will tell you your emotions and feelings are important and valid just because someone deems you as overly sensitive and as person who cant take joke doesnt mean your feelings are absurd theyre yours and noone has the right to decide whether theyre allowed to exist or not or whether theyre appropriate only you are the judge of that its not your job to try to adjust your sensitivity for the group or friendship it will only make you suppress your emotions including anger and over time it can lead to serious health conditions like depression burnout or even autoimmune diseases if you tell someone youre not comfortable with their teasing and they imply its your fault and dismiss their feelings theyre just joking and youre too dramatic its only banter between friends etc people like that are not your friends because good friend might tease you too but they will respect your wish to stop and they wont look for excuses like that if someone tells you that this is just how people in the group show affection especially its what guys tend to say in the male groups dont believe that too its only true when youve been close friends with someone for years not for month many people are just caught up in toxic friendships and they are making justifications for themselves and others within these toxic systems they live in lots of them dont really have good sense of how healthy friendships should work because we all have been brainwashed into the ideals of toxic masculinity the tough guy act and toxic femininity for centuries which makes us believe that excessive roasting each other is normal form of bonding with others mean excessive not casual joking around that happens from time to time to everyones consent and within preexisiting limits so cut off people who dismiss your feelings after you tell them theyre making you uncomfortable with teasing its about consent it doesnt matter what the joke is about or how heavy it is if you withdraw consent to tease you about something and someone continues to tease you anyway because they think youre unreasonable with this theyre the asshole who doesnt deserve to be in your life if someone makes jabs at you even when you get rid of toxic people its still unavoidable sometimes make them uncomfortable ask them what do you mean by that or didint quite catch that can you repeat that force them to say out loud what they actually meant with joke or their comment it will make them feel awkward and put the spot if they will tell you its just joke ask them and which part is funny pretend like you really dont understand if this wont work or the situation wont turn out in your favour anyway draw boundaries always say what you will do if they wont respect your boundaries dont tolerate being spoken to that way if you continue to speak to me like that will start ignoring you and then keep that promise if they wont change you can also say dont respond to this kind of negativity are you comfortable saying that out loud if you wan na troll them little you can also ask them if theyre okay are they feeling alright or do they need glass of water people hate it when you imply theyre out of control and distressed peoples insults tell you lot about what is important to them and how they measure their own worth this is something my friend told me once you can use that to your advantage although personally prefer these neutral responses because they cut the conversation immediately however its still something nice to be aware of when someone insults you frequently take look at what theyre attacking in you and what kind of insecurity lies behind their words and then attack it yourself for example if someone constantly makes fun of your appearance theyre probably worried about their own looks as well someone points out your crooked teetch point out their double chin prepare to be gaslit by people and memorise responses for that people will try to make you look crazy or unreasonable after receiving pushback from you like said they will attempt to shun your emotions by saying stuff like its just joke calm down was only joking thats just banter between friends it means we like you are you always so oversensitive you need to develop thicker skin they might also imply you interpreted what they said the wrong way meant thatyou took it wrong or that you overreacted never buy into that this is known as gaslighting and its meant to dismiss your feelings and perception of situation so the other person doesnt look like bully that theyre its actually one of the abuse tactics how can you respond to that can take joke cant take disrespect my emotions are not up for debate hear you and disagree and wont take this from you no matter what you think of it just because you dont want to hear out my emotions and needs doesnt mean will stop talking about them understand its better if we keep our lives separate then see youre not willing to find the middle ground thats okay im going to leave now btw its not recommended to tell them that you know theyre gaslighting you they will just deny it be very business the grey rock technique toxic people live off negativity and drama they like provoking people and getting emotional reaction out of them for their amusement it gives them the feeling of superiority and quick dopamine fix so when you sense someone like that the so called shodringers asshole the joker of the group who thinks youre an easy target starve them use phrases suggested above and dont ever show them your anger be boring as fuck around them appear bored and unimpressed with their teasing as if youre dealing with child the game theyre playing is about whether you lose your integrity and your face in front of group remain your composure no matter what its better to lose an argument than to lose control of your emotions here avoid drama like flames because eventually it will burn you if you get too close to it so it means never gossip about other people unless youre talking to some really trusted friend dont get involved with peoples drama its none of your business and dont share too much of personal information to people who you arent sure of yet even if they seem to be nice and gossiping and oversharing with them feels tempting dont be passive aggressive with people dont get pulled into their negativity dont match energy always remain elegant and short with immature people and they will leave you alone their own because you wont be fun for them biggest critics are talkers not doers you can embarass them by taking it to the surface for everyone to see lets say someone judges you for not getting enough excercise your response could be so we see each other tomorrow in the morning for run watch them turn red of course it can sometimes backfire if theyre doing something so its risky but generally people who like to nitpick others like that tend to be lazy in some areas of life themselves those who make real improvements in their lives dont have need to put others down prepare to be gossiped about by some people behind your back just because you cant be bothered by people who want to bother you toxic people will get mad that they cant take advantage of you emotionally and that they cant feed off your energy so they will be left with last resort smearing your name to other people in order to convince them that youre bad person so that their actions towards you will seem justified they will try to make as much people as possible to gang up you you might get weird vibes from them and their circles they will glance at each other while youre talking you might hear from them or someone that you have stick up your butt that youre arrogant antisocial or even troubled or needing help just because you saw them as theyre and you decided to not deal with their bullshit they will sort of exclude you but not entirely because they need scaepagoat in groups like that theres always bunch of mindless sheep and one wolf usually the shodringers assholethe joker who controls their perception of you at this point let them be stop talking to them and let them have whatever funny story they made up about you people like that just need someone to obsess over someone in order to feel relevant identify the group bullies early lots of groups have one to prevent yourself from future attacks from what ive noticed in many groups theres always this one person who loves to pick others or the groups preferrable scapegoat when youre new they will rush to you with teasing and jabs to test your boundaries sometimes theyre the leader too but not always this is always test for you to see how much abuse you can take within group and based your reactions you will have assigned your group role thats why its very important to show people that you cant be fucked with early or else they will beat you down so much that after some time any expression of self respect coming from you will be seen as an attack groups integrity so dont be scared to talk shit back when youre new in the group or use the tactics suggested here they wont like you if youre too nice however if you feel like theres too many bullies in group the group enagages in bullying regularly rather than occasionally or one of them is the leader run in this case you wont win your own and you will only end up dreading ever meeting them in the first place few years later its lonely road but its worth it because you wont build true connection with people who dont respect you as person anyway and loneliness isnt failure of your character but byproduct of not willing to be part of toxic dynamics people tend to act as if toxic people and bullies are super rare but in fact its the opposite they are everywhere and theyre much more common than we think theyre not cartoonish villains theyre regular people who can act kind and seem normal lots of them are just insecure and have issues with self worth this means that if you really want to be respected by other people you will have to cut off or draw lines with many of them because there are more unehealthy people out there than healthy ones so be aware that you will make many people uncomfortable with your assertiveness and no tolerance for bs some of them will go out of their way to try to pull you back into the victim role through gaslighting making justifications for the bad behavior implying youre taking things too far let them have this mindset they cant be reasoned with unless they experienced being in your place themselves after you raise your standards in friendships and all your connections you will start expecting people around you to be respectful or else the door is there many people will also try to convince you that youll end lonely and friendless because of this and you might feel that theyre right however no friendship or friend group is that important and gives you that much fulfillment in life that theyre worth compromising your own sense of self worth in genuine and healthy relationships theres nothing to compromise in that matter you dont have to choose between someones company and your own boundaries around people whose presence serves you only abusive people put you in such position saying dont drink poison just because youre thirsty sums up this idea well were all socialised to tolerate bullying and abuse from early age thats why many people will try to convince you that the bullies are not as bad troubled or having hard time too because its not just the toxic people that will try to pull you into their orbit its also all the people around them who tolerate and normalise their behavior which leads me to the next point its not just the teasers and the bullies you need to watch out for be careful of enablers enablers are people who will protect the bullies and excuse their mistreatment of others through various lens theyre the sheep was talking about earlier and there are plenty of them they dont usually have bad intentions for you theyre simply in denial and they follow their leader they can be nice to you and dont do any direct harm to you but theyre still dangerous to you because when you will get bullied by their leader they will stand by and do nothing then they will come up to you ask if youre okay and offer some advice which will basically mean that maybe you should accept their leader and give them some slack because enablers can also attack you by proxy not knowing that the leader is pulling secretly the strings the leader will gossip about you to them or insinuate something and then you will be met with their weirdly sudden hostile behavior they seemed neutral or even nice before but now theyre kinda distant passive aggressive their energy is different thats because the leader convinces them over time that youre bad person and in their heads theyre doing all of this from the goodness of their heart personally ive been fooled more in life by enablers than by the leaders because their intentions are genuine they just dont know that theyre pawns being moved against the target you so when youre cutting off the leader that one person who is hostile to you you also usually will lose contact with people who uknowingly protect them thats why said its
